# Liveline Attribution

Portions of the live plot engine in this repository are adapted from:

- Project: `liveline`
- URL: https://github.com/benjitaylor/liveline
- License: MIT
- Source commit: `a913578832784bb6abdb148b6af9cf1739be2759`

## Local modifications

- Ported engine to framework-agnostic runtime for Svelte integration.
- Added multiseries rendering for per-device overlays.
- Removed badge, pulse, momentum, and current horizontal line features.
- Added shared scrub crosshair behavior for stacked charts.
- Kept loading / no-data visual language and smoothing approach.

## License note

Upstream is MIT licensed. Retain attribution comments in adapted files.
